question: What is the role of dharma in the pursuit of moksha?

enhanced_query_object.final_query_string: Moksha (liberation) puruṣārtha Moksha (Liberation) karma yoga mokṣa path to moksha prabandhakalpanā dharma vs. moksha Purpose of Dharma niṣkāma karma dharma Path to Liberation (Moksha) Moksha
enhanced_query_object.user_query: What is the role of dharma in the pursuit of moksha?

query.original: What is the role of dharma in the pursuit of moksha?

verses.content: evam putra utpādana ādi karman aviccheda eva saṃtata prabandha rūpa vṛt hi yas āt idam loka tasmāt tad aviccheda tad kṛ na mokṣa iti artha

tad kadācid parama kāruṇika ācārya ātman jñāna prabodha kṛt śabdaka vedānta mahat vākya bherī tad karṇa mūla tāḍay etad eva sṛṣṭi ādi kartṛ tva prakṛ puruṣa pur śī ātman brahman bṛhattatama takāra eka lup tatatama vyāptatama paripṛ ākāśa vat pratibudh paś
tad idam devatā apyaya lakṣaṇa para puruṣa artha etad mokṣa
bhū evam kevala ātman jñāna mokṣa sādhana na tu atra aka eva adhikṛ viśeṣa aśravaṇa

tad etad agni ādi devatā lokapāla tva saṃkalpay sṛj īśvara idam saṃsāra rṇava saṃsāra samudra mahat avidyā kāma karman prabhava duḥkha udaka tīvra roga jarā mṛtyu mahat grāha an ādi ananta apāra nirālamba viṣaya indriya janay sukhaa vakṣaṇa viśrāma pañc an indriya artha tṛṇmāruta vikṣobha utthāanartha śata mahat ūrmi mahāraurava ādi aneka niraya gam hāhā ityādi kūj a ākrośana udbhū mahat rava atya ārjava dāna dayā hiṃsā śama dama dhṛti ādi ātman guṇa pātheya pūrṇa jñāna uḍupa sat saṅga sarva tyāga mārga mokṣa tīra etad mahat arṇava prapat pat tatavat
